citations.narrative:
The licensee did not maintain acquisition records for several acquired skunks. The licensee did not maintain birth records
for skunks. Multiple skunks were disposed of with inaccurate disposition records. Complete and accurate acquisition and
disposition records must be obtained. These records are essential during times of disease outbreaks and ensure animals
are acquired from legitimate sources.
Correct by: Correct by 12/8/2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
The licensee did not maintain acquisition records for several acquired skunks. The licensee did not maintain birth records 
for skunks. Multiple skunks were disposed of with inaccurate disposition records. Complete and accurate acquisition and 
disposition records must be obtained. These records are essential during times of disease outbreaks and ensure animals 
are acquired from legitimate sources. 
Correct by: Correct by 12/8/2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
